Katya entered the base and looked around for Rodimus. She still had 
that piece of the sphere to give him and she thought that the pumpkin 
guy was worth mentionning too.

Katya: Blackfang, do you have any idea where Rodimus is, quineg?

Blackfang: Nope, but just ask the computer.

She looked at him with a strange look on her face.

Katya: Your computers answer when you call? What did you put in there? 
Dog chips?

The black wolf smiled slightly and turned his head upward.

Blackfang: Computer, give the current position of Rodimus.

OOC: I don't remember whee he was, so Robo, can you answer? :)
